text: A karate gi is a standardized piece of karate clothing that acts as a uniform.Karate Gi Overview. Retrieved December 28, 2009. Whether or not a student is ranked, one must bring a gi to the academy. == Components == A karate gi includes a martial arts jacket, as well as a martial arts pant.Gi Components. Retrieved August 5, 2010. The gi is white. The belt can be: # White # Yellow # Purple # Orange # Green # Blue # Brown # Black (sub-divided by dan) == References == gi Category:Sports clothing
title: Karate gi
